name: Cheese and Beef Enchiladas
author: Sargento
summary: Beat taco night with enchilada night! These restaurant-style spicy enchiladas will surely please a crowd.
ingredients: ¾ pound lean ground sirloin or turkey
1 ½ cups diced red or green bell pepper
2 cups SARGENTO® Fine Cut OR Traditional Cut Shredded 4 Cheese Mexican
1 ½ cups salsa or picante sauce
directions: Heat large skillet over medium-high heat; add meat and bell pepper
Cook 5 minutes, stirring until meat crumbles and is no longer pink; drain
Simmer, uncovered, 5 minutes or until sauce thickens, stirring occasionally
Spoon 1/3 cup meat mixture down center of each tortilla; sprinkle with 2 tablespoons cheese
Roll up; place seam-side down in greased 13x9-inch baking pan
Cover with foil; bake in preheated 375 degrees F oven 18 minutes or until heated through
Bake 2 minutes more or until cheese is melted
Serve with lettuce, tomato, if desired, sour cream
